backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing notes with attachment metadata, user profiles, and role‑based access control for submitting, viewing, and moderating notes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading the main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, layout, header, footer, theme provider, and profile‑setup modal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Route guard prompting unauthenticated users to sign in before accessing protected pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ModeratorGa: Gate component restricting access to moderator‑only pages and showing an access‑denied state for non‑admins.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and saves it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/empty-states/Emp: Reusable empty‑state component displaying an illustration, title, description, and optional action.
frontend/src/components/header/AppHeader: Renders the top navigation bar with links, login button, and mobile menu, adapting options based on auth and admin status.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Provides a page container with optional title/description and configurable max‑width.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteCard.t: Displays a note preview card with title, subject, description, timestamps, attachments, and optional status badge.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteStatus: Shows a badge indicating whether a note is verified, rejected, or pending.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches whether the current caller is an admin using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeration.ts: Supplies queries and mutations for moderation, including fetching pending notes and verifying or rejecting them.
Manages locally stored offline notes per authenticated user, with functions to save, remove, and check notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains various note‑related queries and mutations, including fetching verified notes, submissions, profiles, and submitting or saving data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base styles to body and borders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/moderation/ModeratorQ: Displays pending notes for moderators with metadata and navigation to individual review pages.
frontend/src/pages/moderation/ModeratorR: Moderator review page that loads a pending note, shows its details, and allows moderators to verify or reject it with an optional reason.
frontend/src/pages/MySubmissionsPage.tsx: Displays the user's submitted notes with loading states and an empty state that links to the submission page.
frontend/src/pages/NoteDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed information about a note, including metadata, status, offline save options, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/OfflinePage.tsx: Shows notes saved for offline access with loading placeholders and an empty state linking back to browsing.
frontend/src/pages/PublicBrowsePage.tsx: Lists verified notes with subject/unit filtering, loading states, and empty state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitNotePage.tsx: Provides a form for submitting new notes, including attachments, validation, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted URL-based state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, architecture notes, features, requirements, and image needs.
